summary: Makes master difficulty twice as difficult, or even more.
descriptionHtml:
***INSTALLATION***

Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) Installation (www.skyrimnexus.com/content/modmanager):
a)  Download through NMM, and activate there.
b)  Follow as from 3) below

Manual Installation:
1) Unzip the files to a directory of your choosing.
2) Move the ESP file \'Intense Difficulty 2x\' into the Data directory of your Skyrim installation (located inside the steam folder, under steamapps/common/skyrim).
3) When starting Skyrim, click on data files, and make sure the \'Intense Difficulty 2x.esp\' is checked.
4) Run Skyrim!

Only activate one plug-in at a time! See the file list below for details.


***BASICS***
Increases the multipliers to make master significantly more difficult.  Really, ideally used if you want to use the game to it\'s utmost; ie, exploiting alchemy, enchanting, and smithing to get high-end equipment.

If you like it, take a look at my other mod - PISE: Pluto\'s Improved Skyrim Experience - which aims to create a more difficult gameplay through AI changes, spawn changes, and overhaul the way the game plays while retaining the regular Skyrim feel - without requiring exploits of any kind.

http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1269

I will not be integrating this into PISE, as it goes against what I feel the game should be.  Nevertheless, some people were interested in this, and it was a quick change once I found the variables.

***FILE LIST***
Main files:
Intense Difficulty 2x.esp -  Twice the difficulty of master.
Intense Difficulty 4x.esp -  Four times the difficulty.
Intense Difficulty 8x.esp -  8 times the difficulty.
Intense Difficulty 16x.esp - 16 times the difficulty (are you crazy?)
Intense Difficulty 32x.esp - 32 times the difficulty (heh, no way.)

***CHANGELOG***
v1.0 Initial Release
author: Pluto
